twoSetSkill.name: Flash Freezing 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Enlarges the AOE of the water balloon explosion by 2 meters. Enemies within the explosion AOE are frozen for 1.5s.

threeSetSkill.name: Concentrated Water Balloon 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Exploding water balloon deals 200% more Ice DMG. Shortens CD by 2s.
